templates.name: Phone Support
templates.content: You can give us a call at 866.673.1773 (Mon-Fri 9-5 EST) or let me know if I can help via text, it may be faster.

templates.name: Store Location / Retailer
templates.content: You can find us at a store near you here: https://zesttorganics.com/apps/store-locator/

templates.name: Brand ambassador / sponsorship
templates.content: Thank you so much for reaching out and for your interest in working with Zestt! Please feel free to send your information to customercare@shopzestt.com and we will absolutely pass your information along. We will reach back out to you if we are interested in pursuing further.

templates.name: What is Recycled Cashmere?
templates.content:
Our recycled Cashmere is made with pre-consumer fibers that meet the Global Recycled Standard. By using pre-consumer recycled cashmere, zestt is able to re-purpose material that
would otherwise be disposed of and maintain our commitment to sustainability.

templates.name: What is the difference between the classic organic cotton and cloudspun cashmere?
templates.content: Our classic Dreamsoft Travel Scarf in Organic Cotton is a tried-and-true customer favorite made of 100% GOTS certified organic cotton. Our newest Dreamsoft Travel Scarf in Cloudspun Cashmere is made of 20% Recycled Cashmere and 80% Cashmere for a super warm, luxury travel piece. Both are perfectly sized for any adventure.

templates.name: What is Cashmere?
templates.content: Cashmere is a natural fiber combed from the undercoats of the Cashmere Goats found across the Himalayas. Once collected, the fibers are cleaned, refined and spun into yarn to create beautiful, luxury pieces like our Dreamsoft Travel Scarf in CloudSpun Recycled Cashmere.

templates.name: Social Media
templates.content: Give us a follow on IG: https://www.instagram.com/zesttorganics/?hl=en and FB here: https://www.facebook.com/zesttorganics

templates.name: Military / First responder / Healthcare / Teacher discount
templates.content: Thank you for your service! We don't have any specific discounts like that but if it helps, you can check out the items we have on sale here: https://zesttorganics.com/collections/sale

templates.name: Rewards / referral
templates.content: We have a rewards program where you can earn points to redeem on future purchases. Check it out here: https://zesttorganics.com/pages/rewards-program-page

templates.name: Where are your items made / manufactured?
templates.content: We proudly make all of our products in India with our GOTS certified partners.  This means that our products all carry the GOTS seal, demonstrating that they are made with 100% organic cotton and manufactured using the highest social and environmental standards.

templates.name: Customer Support
templates.content: The best way to handle this is to email us directly at customercare@zesttorganics.com. Our team is happy to help!

templates.name: Free Shipping
templates.content: We offer free shipping on domestic orders over $100 in the continental U.S. Maybe you can add something else to reach the minimum?

templates.name: What is your cloudspun cashmere made of?
templates.content: It's made of 20% Recycled Cashmere and 80% Cashmere.

templates.name: How should I care for CloudSpunTM Recycled Cashmere collection
templates.content: To take the best care of your CloudspunTM Recycled Cashmere Travel Scarf, we recommend Dry Clean or hand wash & lay flat to dry.

templates.name: Wholesale inquiries
templates.content: The best way to discuss wholesale is to email us directly at customercare@zesttorganics.com. Our team is happy to chat!

templates.name: Shipping Time
templates.content: Our processing time takes 2 business days, and we usually ship via UPS or USPS. Once shipped, it will take up to 7 business days for domestic orders.

templates.name: Million Miles collection: Do the items stretch out?
templates.content:
Our Million Miles Collection is crafted from a terry blend fabric and is
not expected to stretch out when wearing. We recommend
purchasing your standard size and our size guide can be found on
the product page.

templates.name: Million Miles collection: Where is this made?
templates.content:
Our Million Miles Collection is crafted in Peru with a pima cotton
blend.

templates.name: Million Miles collection: Is the fabric heavy?
templates.content:
We crafted the Million Miles collection with a french terry blend. This
fabric has a soft, warm texture that feels like your favorite lightweight
sweatshirt, making it suitable for activewear and all-day wear!

templates.name: Million Miles collection: Do the items wrinkle?
templates.content:
We created the Million Miles Collection with a pima cotton/spandex
blend to help alleviate some of the wrinkling concern but since all of
our products are made free of harmful chemicals, slight wrinkling or
curling of edges can occur. We do suggest that if this happens, a
quick pass with a steamer or cool iron can help to flatten out and
reshape your zestt piece. When not in use, a simple fold will keep it
looking fresh on the go.

templates.name: Million Miles collection: Is the Stone color see through?
templates.content:
Our Million Miles Collection is constructed of a terry blend fabric and
is not see through.

templates.name: Million Miles collection: How do I wash / care for my items?
templates.content: The best way to care for your items and keep them in good condition involves machine washing them cold, using a gentle cycle. Do not use bleach, and tumble dry on a low heat. If ironing is needed, use a cool setting to avoid scorching or burning the fabric.

templates.name: Million Miles collection: Is the fabric warm?
templates.content:
We crafted the Million Miles collection with a french terry blend. This
fabric has a soft, warm texture that feels like your favorite lightweight
sweatshirt, making it suitable for activewear and all-day wear!

templates.name: Million Miles collection: Do the items shrink?
templates.content:
Our Million Miles Collection is crafted from a terry blend fabric and is
not expected to shrink when following the wash and care instructions
found on the tag. Please wash your new items on a cold, gentle cycle
and tumble dry low for the best results. We recommend purchasing
your standard size and our size guide can be found on the product
page.

templates.name: Million Miles collection: What is the fabric?
templates.content:
We crafted our Million Miles collection with 95% pima cotton and 5%
spandex. This is referred to as a terry blend and is highly breathable,
allowing for better air circulation. Feeling like your favorite lightweight
sweatshirt, this fabric prevents overheating, making it suitable for
activewear and all-day wear.

templates.name: Sizing
templates.content: Happy to help you find the right size! Our clothes generally run true to size and you can check out our size guide here:  https://zesttorganics.com/pages/sizing-chart?srsltid=AfmBOoqsQdTni2hwcgP0skYPqNjcEuLzPo2gzshvMecqNPV6SFwGpAq2. Do you mind sharing your usual size?

templates.name: Can I exchange items from CloudSpunTM Recycled Cashmere collection
templates.content: We would be happy to offer an exchange for an item of equal value. Returns and exchanges can be requested through our quick and easy portal at https://zesttorganics.com/apps/redo/account/login

templates.name: Returns/Exchange
templates.content: You can start your return here: https://zesttorganics.com/apps/redo/account/login

templates.name: Return policy
templates.content: You can check out our detailed return policy here: https://zesttorganics.gorgias.help/en-US/what-is-your-return-policy-134464

templates.name: Cancel/Edit
templates.content: We typically aren't able to make changes to orders once they have been placed due to them being processed almost immediately. We would be happy to look into if your order has already been processed. Depending on if we can catch it in time, we would either be able to make this change or would recommend you placing a new order and us cancelling the existing order. Can you please share your order number and email address as well?

templates.name: Do you ship internationally?
templates.content: Currently we are able to ship orders to the United States and Canada.

templates.name: Where do you ship from?
templates.content: All orders ship from our warehouse in Columbus, Ohio.
